title: RBI urges gold loan firms to monitor portfolios following lapses
description: The Reserve Bank of India has flagged concerns regarding gold loans issued through fintech partnerships and business correspondents. Key issues include improper gold valuation, inadequate KYC compliance, and unsafe gold storage and transport. The RBI mandates all supervised entities to review their practices and report corrective actions within three months.
